details.name: Gaurav Kumar Ojha
details.Summary: Experienced Full Stack Python Developer skilled in micro-services, CI/CD, AWS, and API development. Achievements: 95% task automation, award recognition, leadership in problem-solving, enhancing software infrastructure, and improving developer experience

description: Designed Micro-services Architecture, automating loans processing, reducing tasks by 80%
Established CI/CD pipeline for 100% automated feature releases, earning a Bronze Cheers Award
Independently authored two Python Flask web APIs, recognized for teamwork and quick learning
Orchestrated AWS infrastructure and Kong Gateway for deployment in six environments
Leading a team of seven, enhancing infrastructure and developer experience
Engineered Python-OpenCV solution for structured data extraction from PDFs.
Crafted user-friendly Vue.js annotation tool for image data.
Effectively led 18-member team, deploying IDX solutions for three clients.
Solution extracted 92% of data with 98% accuracy from 150 page application under 20 sec.
Earned Spot, GEMS, and Chairman's Excellence Awards for rapid development and stellar teamwork.
Led Research and Innovation Team, automating transaction filtering, reducing manual tasks by 85%.
Engineered a robust Python Flask API, achieving a remarkable 92% accuracy rate.
Designed user-friendly frontends (Angular, WPF), deployed for two clients.
Collaborated in Agile, fostering continuous improvement with clients.
